reviews.text: We had a birthday birthday lunch at the Daruma yesterday. First time eating there, and I must say we had a great experience. All the food was high-quality...
Sushi time!! Sometime when I'm the area, I enjoy stopping by here for a sushi lunch. It's usually quite and not busy, which is ok with me. I've always found...

Amazing food!! Take out and dine in, they never fail to provide a delicious meal. 

As with typical Japanese steakhouses, they give you A LOT of food. Go...
